text:
Hello!

Just saw this: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/changelog/v3-lists-api>

What would be nice is to be able to get a filtered list of lists and delete lists

The use cas I have in mind is :

Get all list with no dependancies using properties containing "XYZ" and delete them. This would help to archive legacy properties that are no longer in use.

Hey Louis - thanks for taking a look at the new Lists API.

Our primary focus for the next feature set is giving customers the ability to create, update, and delete lists using this API.

If I understand your use case correctly, it sounds like what would be useful for you is an API endpoint where you are able to fetch and/or delete lists that meet certain filter criteria. This is an interesting idea and something I will take back to the team as a potential  feature.

We appreciate the suggestion and look forward to hearing any additional feedback!
in fact if you already have a delete endpoint in the making, I would just need a list/get endpoint <@U05Q2R4ESCA>
